main event: A disc-shaped object was sighted over Rapid City, South Dakota, on February 23, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as stationary and had a variable appearance., It was observed for approximately 4 minutes., The object was reported at an approximate altitude of 13,000 feet., Two pilots stationed at Rapid City Air Force documented the sighting., The object measured about 4 to 5 feet in diameter.
sighted object: a disc-shaped object in the sky
witness description: LT.C.F. City and LT Surface, both pilots stationed at Rapid City Air Force.
